item.description:
Are you a bugs bunny fan? It's amazing how the humor of these animated stories hold up over time. Seeing it on the big screen with some snacks and a cup of beer....well how could I resist setting this up as a meetup?


I will be outside the brattle by 7:30 wearing a meetup pin and carrying a meetup sign. Show time is at 8.

I strongly advise you to buy your tickets in advance as shows at the brattle frequently sell out. The link for buying tickets is:

https://www.vendini.c...


The Sixteenth Annual!

A school vacation treat for kids and fun-loving adults alike, the Brattle’s BUGS BUNNY FILM FESTIVAL has been delighting audiences for well over a decade! Join us this year as we offer the traditional ALL BUGS REVUE, starring everyone’s favorite wascally wabbit.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be outside the theater at 7:30 until they let us inside, Probably about 7:45 or so. I will be wearing a meetup pin and carrying a meetup sign.
item.name: The Bugs Bunny Film Festival
